Uses of Package
org.mozilla.taskcluster.client.hooks

  • Packages that use org.mozilla.taskcluster.client.hooks 
    Package Description
    org.mozilla.taskcluster.client.hooks  
  • Classes in org.mozilla.taskcluster.client.hooks used by org.mozilla.taskcluster.client.hooks 
    Class and Description
    HookCreationRequest
    Definition of a hook that can create tasks at defined times.
    HookCreationRequest.Metadata 
    HookDefinition
    Definition of a hook that will create tasks when defined events occur.
    HookDefinition.Metadata 
    HookGroups
    List of hookGroupIds.
    HookList
    List of hooks
    HookScheduleResponse
    A description of when a hook’s task will be created, and the next scheduled time
    HookStatusResponse
    A snapshot of the current status of a hook.
    TaskStatusStructure
    A representation of task status as known by the queue
    TaskStatusStructure.Status 
    TaskStatusStructure.Status.RunInformation 
    TaskTemplate
    Definition of a task embedded in a hook
    TaskTemplate.MetaData 
    TriggerTokenResponse
    Secret token for a trigger
